descriptionHtml:
==============================================================================================================================================
Please Endorse If You Download
===============================================================================================================================================
==============
Description
==============
This mod makes it so you have a chance of encountering either hunters or werewolves in the wild.

I have added a new stronger werewolf and also balanced out their health, so they are now more resistant to all forms of damage and magic, but weaker to silver waepons.

I have now also added a new testing hall with one of each of the werewolves I have added, it can be reached by using the console and typing \"coc werewolftesting\" without the quotes

==============
Load order
==============
Any load order should work with this mod

==============
Compatability
==============
This mod should be compatible with all mods, but if you have any other mods that change the stats of werewolves then make sure that they are loaded after this one.
e.g.

==============
Changelog
==============
V1.6 - Reduced resistance to magic, so you are now able to kill them with magic
V1.5 - Fixed bug were all werewolves spawned dead, also added a testing hall with werewolves in
V1.4 - Reduced werewolf health due to them being overpowered
V1.3 - Werewolves health balanced out, they are now more resistant to all forms of damage and magic, but have a high weakness to silver. Change spawn points so there is a chance Hunters will still appear.
V1.2 - New werewolves are now much stronger
V1.1 - New werewolves added
V1 - Initial Release

==============
Alternate Downloads
==============
This mod is also available on the Steam Workshop for those who prefer to download from there:
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=10678

==============
Future Releases
==============
Once I become more competent with the CK I will make the werewolves have their own spawn points, so the hunters are able to stay in the game.
I also intend to make the player able to catch Lycanthrapy off the werewolves, thus letting the player become a werewolf without having to do The Companions

==============
Extra
==============
This is my second mod for Skyrim so please be patient if there are any bugs, flaws, problems etc as I will do my best to get them fixed as soon as possible.
If you do find any problems please let me know
Please leave a comment if you want something implemented, if you like the mod take the time to rate the file, thanks!
author: Game Raider 500
